name: Paper Mayhem - War FLicK
description:
Paper Mayhem - War FLicK is a 2 player, turn based game where players employ both skill and strategy to our manoeuvre each other and destroy the other player's base.

Based on a pen and paper game we use to play as kids,  Paper Mayhem - War FLicK brings the same fun action to your mobile device.

RECOMMENDED GAME PLAY RULES:

OVERVIEW

  1.  Players chooses a Map to do battle on.
  2. Players decide to play either the GREEN STAR BASE or the BLUE CIRCLE BASE then take turns playing
  3. The Player that scores 5 hits on the other players base wins!

TURNS

  1. Players take turns playing. The Player that controls the GREEN STAR always goes first.
  2. Your Turn ends if:
    1.  You have failed to hit any enemy ship after launching your own ship.
    2.  One of your ships hits the enemy LAUNCHER.
    3.  One of your ships hits the enemy BASE.
  3. Ending your turn - You end you turn by tapping on the "TIMER STOP" button at the top centre of the screen. Ending your turn automatically starts the other player's Timer.

TIMER

  1. On the start of your turn, your timer will start counting down. Each Player is given a total of 5 minutes to achieve victory. You loose, If you run out of time during your turn. So player must think and act fast during their turn!
  2. Tapping the TIMER STOP button will stop your time and will automatically start the other player's time.

WINNING

  1. The player that successfully cores 5 hits to the opposing player's base 5  wins the match!
  2. You also win the game, If the opposing player runs out of time during his/her turn.

UNLOCKING MAPS

There are 6 battleground maps to choose from.  Each Map will have its own challenge and strategy to win. 

Upon installation MAP 1 is automatically unlocked. You can unlock the other maps by playing the game and scoring a victory. Each victory awards you with 5 STAR POINTS which you can use to unlock the other maps!

OPEN ENDED RULES

Paper Mayhem - War FLicK was intentionally designed to allow players to invent their own set of rules. The RULES provided here are to be used as a mere example of how the game could be played. Just like the games we played as children, Paper Mayhem - War FLicK allows us to be creative and playful!
